value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We've journeyed for 10 days since
we entered the realm of the dead...$k$pWe've avoided any major conflicts,
and kept the enemy's eyes off us.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Finally, we draw near the castle.
Hel's castle...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes. On the very edge of this dark
realm...she dwells.$k$pWait. Be careful,
$Nu...$k$pDeath is coming. My mother...is here.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So, you've chosen to show your face.$k$pIf we defeat you here, in the realm
of the dead, will you die?$k$pOr is there more to this puzzle? I
will find out soon enough!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Whatever you try, it is of no use.
In the face of death, all efforts
crumble...$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What now? Is Hel...gone?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_05,0|$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Foolish mortal.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah!
$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,128,0,128,255|$Fi2000|$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|A curse in the name of Hel, ruler of
the dead...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Guh! So this... This is it...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Your father traded his life to extend
yours. What idiocy.$k$pIt changes nothing, princeling...
You will die yet.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I suppose it must be as you say, Hel.$k$p$EFace|Come on, then! Curse me.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|After nine days pass, as your father
did, you too will die.$k$pWhy do you smile, boy? Has fear
driven you mad?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Don't you understand? It is your
curse, after all...$k$pIt is certain that I will die. But if the
curse truly lasts nine days...$k$pThat's a period of time in which
you cannot kill me.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I have already infiltrated your realm.
I will learn how to defeat you. That
knowledge lurks here, somewhere...$k$pAnd I need not seek you out once I
find it. After nine days pass, you will
appear before me again.$k$pSo lay your curse upon me, Hel,
ruler of the dead. I will accept it—
happily.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Because it means that it is your life
that will end in nine days' time.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What insolence! You do not fear my
curse? You do not fear death? You
do not fear me?$k$pVery well. I can correct that. I will
withhold my death curse. That fate
is too easy for you...$k$pI will carve the terror of death into
your very bones. Then, and only
then, will I bring you death...$k$p$Sbs3000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So...$k$pShe's gone now.$k$pThen I was right. Somewhere in
this realm...there is a clue to how
I might defeat Hel.$k$p$Sbs150|
